Verses: 1 yesu Marupadiyum Avargalode Uvamaigalaaip Pesi Sonnadhu Ennavendraal:
2 paralogaraajyam Than Kumaaranukkuk Kaliyaananjeydha Oru Raajaavukku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
3 azhaikkappattavargalaik Kaliyaanaththirku Varasollumpadi Avan Than Oozhiyakkaararai Anuppinaan; Avargalo Vara Manadhillaadhirundhaargal.

4 appozhudhu Avan Veru Oozhiyakkaararai Azhaiththu: Neengal Poi, Idho, En Virundhai Aayaththampanninen, En Erudhugalum Kozhuththa Jendhukkalum Adikkappattadhu, Ellaam Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu; Kaliyaanaththirku Vaarungal Endru Azhaikkappattavargalukku Sollungalendru Anuppinaan.
5 azhaikkappattavargalo Adhai Asattaipanni, Oruvan Than Vayalukkum, Oruvan Than Viyaapaaraththukkum Poivittaargal.
6 matravargal Avan Oozhiyakkaararaip Pidiththu, Avamaanappaduththi, Kolaiseydhaargal.
7 raajaa Adhaik Kelvippattu, Kobamadaindhu, Than Senaigalai Anuppi, Andhak Kolaipaadhagarai Azhiththu, Avargal Pattanaththaiyum Sutteriththaan.
8 appozhudhu, Avan Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Kaliyaana Virundhu Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu, Azhaikkappattavargalo Adharku Apaaththiraraaipponaargal.
9 aagaiyaal, Neengal Vazhichchandhigalile Poi, Kaanappadugira Yaavaraiyum Kaliyaanaththirku Azhaiththukkondu Vaarungal Endraan.
10 andha Oozhiyakkaarar Purappattu, Vazhigalile Poi, Thaangal Kanda Nallaar Pollaar Yaavaraiyum Koottikkonduvandhaargal; Kaliyaanasaalai Virundhaaligalaal Niraindhadhu.
11 virundhaaligalaip Paarkkumpadi Raajaa Ulle Piravesiththapodhu, Kaliyaana Vasthiram Thariththiraadha Orumanushanai Ange Kandu:
12 sinegidhane, Nee Kaliyaana Vasthiramillaadhavanaai Inge Eppadi Vandhaai Endru Kettaar. Adharku Avan Pesaamalirundhaan.
13 appozhudhu, Raajaa Panividaikkaararai Nokki: Ivanaik Kaiyungaalum Kattikkondupoi, Azhukaiyum Parkadippum Undaayirukkira Purampaana Irulile Podungal Endraan.
14 andhappadiye, Azhaikkappattavargal Anegar, Therindhukkollappattavargalo Silar Endraar.
15 appozhudhu, Pariseyar Poi, Pechchile Avarai Agappaduththumpadi Yosanaipanni,

16 thangal Seesharaiyum Erodhiyaraiyum Avaridaththil Anuppinaargal. Avargal Vandhu: Podhagare, Neer Saththiyamullavarendrum, Thevanudaiya Maarkkaththai Aththigamaaip Podhikkiravarendrum, Neer Mugadhaatchiniyam Illaadhavaraagaiyaal Evanaikkuriththum Umakkuk Kavalaiyillaiyendrum (akkaraiyillaiyendrum) Arindhirukkirom.
17 aadhalaal, Umakku Eppadith Thondrugiradhu? Raayanukku Varikodukkiradhu Niyaayamo, Allavo? Adhai Engalukku Sollum Endru Kettaargal.
18 yesu Avargal Thurkkunaththai Arindhu: Maayakkaarare, Neengal Ennai En Sothikkireergal?
19 varikkaasai Enakkuk Kaanpiyungal Endraar; Avargal Oru Panaththai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal.
20 appozhudhu Avar: Indha Suroobamum Melezhuththum Yaarudaiyadhu Endru Kettaar.
21 raayanudaiyadhu Endraargal. Adharku Avar: Appadiyaanaal, Raayanudaiyadhai Raayanukkum, Dhevanudaiyadhai Dhevanukkum Seluththungal Endraar.
22 avargal Adhaikkettu Aachchariyappattu Avarai Vittup Poivittaargal.
23 uyirththezhudhal Illai Endru Saadhikkira Sadhuseyar Andraiyaththinam Avaridaththil Vandhu:
24 podhagare, Oruvan Sandhaanam Illaamal Irandhuponaal, Avanudaiya Sagodharan Avan Manaiviyai Vivaagam Panni, Than Sagodharanukku Sandhaanam Undaakkavendum Endru Mose Sonnaare.
25 engalukkulle Sagodharar Ezhu Per Irundhaargal; Mooththavan Vivaagampanni, Mariththu, Sandhaanamillaadhadhinaal Than Manaiviyaith Than Sagodharanukku Vittuvittupponaan.
26 appadiye Irandaam Moondraam Sagodharan Mudhal Ezhaam Sagodharan Varaikkum Seydhaargal.
27 ellaarukkum Pinbu Andha Sthireeyum Irandhuponaal.
28 aagaiyaal, Uyirththezhudhalil, Avvezhuperil Evanukku Aval Manaiviyaayiruppaal? Avargalellaarum Avalai Vivaagam Panniyirundhaargale Endru Kettaargal.
29 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Vedhavaakkiyangalaiyum Dhevanudaiya Vallamaiyaiyum Ariyaamal Thappaana Ennangollukireergal.
30 uyirththezhudhalil, Kolvanaiyum Koduppanaiyum Illai; Avargal Paralogaththile Thevadhoodharaippol Iruppaargal;

31 melum Mariththor Uyirththezhudhalaippatri: Naan Aapiragaamin Thevanum, Eesaakkin Dhevanum, Yaakkopin Dhevanumaayirukkiren Endru Dhevanaal Ungalukku Uraikkappattirukkiradhai Neengal Vaasikkavillaiyaa?
32 dhevan Mariththorukku Dhevanaayiraamal, Jeevanullorukku Dhevanaayirukkiraar Endraar.
33 janangal Idhaik Kettu, Avarudaiya Podhagaththaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattaargal.
34 avar Sadhuseyarai Vaayadaiththaar Endru Pariseyar Kelvippattu, Avaridaththil Koodivandhaargal.
35 avargalil Niyaayasaasthiri Oruvan Avarai Sodhikkumpadi:
36 podhagare, Niyaayappiramaanaththile Endhak Karpanai Piradhaanamaanadhu Endru Kettaan.
37 yesu Avanai Nokki: Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Un Muzhu Irudhayaththodum, Un Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Un Muzhu Manadhodum Anbukooruvaayaaga;
38 idhu Mudhalaam Piradhaana Karpanai.
39 idharku Oppaayirukkira Irandaam Karpanai Ennavendraal, Unnidaththil Nee Anbukooruvadhupolap Piranidaththilum Anbukooruvaayaaga Enpadhe.
40 ivvirandu Karpanaigalilum Niyaayappiramaanam Muzhumaiyum Theerkkadharisanangalum Adangiyirukkiradhu Endraar.
41 pariseyar Koodiyirukkaiyil, Yesu Avargalai Nokki:
42 kiristhuvaikkuriththu Neengal Enna Ninaikkireergal, Avar Yaarudaiya Kumaaran? Endru Kettaar. Avar Dhaaveedhin Kumaaran Endraargal.
43 adharku Avar: Appadiyaanaal, Dhaaveedhu Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Avarai Aandavar Endru Solliyirukkiradhu Eppadi?
44 naan Ummudaiya Saththurukkalai Umakkup Paadhapadiyaakkippodumvaraikkum Neer Ennudaiya Valadhu Paarisaththil Utkaarum Endru Karththar En Aandavarode Sonnaar Endru Solliyirukkiraane.
45 dhaaveedhu Avarai Aandavar Endru Solliyirukka, Avanukku Avar Kumaaranaayiruppadhu Eppadi Endraar.
46 adharku Maruyuththaramaaga Oruvanum Avarukku Oru Vaarththaiyum Sollakkoodaadhirundhadhu. Andrumudhal Oruvanum Avaridaththil Kelviketkath Thuniyavillai.
